it highlights how this plane crash has

course in southern Sinai has been
regarded as one of the safer areas it's
a tourist destination that has continued

after that plane crash he was adamant
that it that it was propaganda from the

that it could take years in the same way

establish when I pointed out to him that
in this region perceptions matter more

were saying to me they just didn't
believe it was technical failure he's
brushed aside all of this propaganda he

they say they were marking
